section.title: Requirements
section.para: In order to run JGlideMon, you first need to install Java. JGlideMon should run on Java 1.5, but some features are only available with Java 1.6+. You can download and install Java from Java's web site.

JGlideMon also requires that you enable the remote server in Glider's configuration. In order to do this,
Open Glider's configuration window by clicking the button.
Glider Window
On the "General" tab, ensure "Enable" is checked in the "Remote Control" section.
Glider Remote Configuration
Note the port number. By default, it is 3200. You may change it if you wish. Enter a password. Remember this as well. Click "Ok" to save and close the configuration window.
